subject: Status Update ORDER #SSN5852
description_text:
Hi,

Just looking to get a status update on order # SSN5852.

conversations.body_text: Hi Douglas. lay1,  Due to demand far exceeding expectations, this item has been out of stock for nearly two weeks. We will arrange shipment within the next two days and sincerely apologize for the delay. Below is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047231333120

The tracking still shows in transit and thatâ€™s it. When should I expect this to be delivered?

Regards,
Doug
